channel.title: Watermelon Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Watermelon Village" - The Village Hidden in the Environs

item.title: Re: Watermelon Village
item.content:encoded: Hey, join, we need people. kthx. We are pretty good except for village size, got quite a few disabled upgrades. :( Kaiju are coming in rather regularly. I am focusing on Party House upgrades since that is all we have left until we get the village size for Epic Monument. (it is difficult holding onto all that Solid Fire without being raided!)

item.title: Re: Watermelon Village
item.content:encoded:
Hey! Posting again… we're hovering around 30 villagers, with a highest size at 40. Looking for devoted/active/intelligent villagers, we are an active village with an active/responsive Kage… what do you want me to say that nobody else has said?

Oh! Some updates since last time… we've got 32 trainers, Jonin Council, Tasty Ramen Shop, War Room, Potion Palace, and a Forest Trail. I keep track of bingos and stuff too, y'know?

Also, if you know what IRE is, you should join! If you don't know what IRE is, you should still join. Because I want YOU to join Watermelon.

item.title: Watermelon Village
item.content:encoded:
Join because you can. Or if you believe in the betterment of the environment.

As of the creation of this thread, we have 9 people (including the Kage), so we're not as helpless as some of the other villages recruiting here. But we're still pretty helpless. We have a Party House though!

So join! We only need a few more people and then the Village can join the NWW. I have all the resources and ryo needed. After we join, things should go along much more quickly.

I am a very active leader, and will try to help you in any matter should you so ask.

~Suikakage =)

P.S. Join! Only you can bring Watermelon to greatness.

ETA: We have now entered the war, with 14 villagers.
